mapper.select: SELECT mebrNo, id, name, nickname, birth, pwd, phone, gender, acct, status, grade, regDate, frsidNmbr, modifyDate, lstidNmbr, etc FROM MEMBER WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (id, name, nickname, birth, pwd, gender, phone, acct, status, grade, regDate, frsidNmbr, modifyDate, lstidNmbr, etc) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{birth}, #{pwd}, #{gender}, #{phone}, #{acct}, #{status}, #{grade}, #{regDate}, #{frsidNmbr}, #{modifyDate}, #{lstidNmbr}, #{etc})
